title: Janny Scott: "The Beneficiary"
description: Michael's conversation with Janny Scott on her book "The Beneficiary: Fortune, Misfortune, and the Story of My Father." Original air date 3 October 2019. The book was published on 16 April 2019.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Janny Scott, Michael Smerconish, TC Scornavacchi)
